text: The flag of Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF ===Historical flags=== File:Bandera de Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos (2015 - 2018).svg|Flag of Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos (2015–2018) File:Bandera de Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos.png|Flag of Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos (2018–2020) ==References== Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillo Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Ixtlahuacán de los Membrillos
